short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Midi files and Music Xml files for musical training

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The program plays Midi and Music Xml files. You can select the tracks you want to hear. 
You may also change the tempo or transpose the song. You may also change the instrument - 
the are four instruments, that can be selected in order to make distinguish the voices.
Also the panorama may be changed from left to right.
